headline: PARAMOUNT+ SETS MARCH 6 NORTH AMERICAN PREMIERE FOR AWARD-WINNING DOCUMENTARY THE PINK PILL: SEX, DRUGS & WHO HAS CONTROL
summary: Paramount+ announced today that breakout documentary THE PINK PILL: SEX, DRUGS & WHO HAS CONTROL will premiere in Canada and the U.S. on March 6, ahead of International Women's Day (March 8). Celebrating powerful storytelling about women by women, the bold and boundary-pushing film examines the cultural, scientific, and political battle behind the first United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and Health Canada-approved treatment for women's sexual desire.
